rules_text:
When Battle-Frenzy Oni enters, you may [b][return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield[/b]] with mana value 3 or less. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step.
Paradigm {4}{B} [i](You may cast this as a sorcery spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
